title: Drawing, "Designs for Table Clocks", 1980s
medium: Graphite, red crayon on white paper
description: Five clock designs in perspective, regularly placed on sheet with design for clock hands.  Reading from upper left: rectangular box; at right, semi-circular clock with curved face; to lower left, cube-shaped clock with grummets over corners; to lower right, cube-shaped clock on wire legs with pod-like feet, clock face with red disks and hour hand with three graduating circles; to lower left, rectangular clock with grummets at all corners; at lower center, study of clock hands with minute hand in from of four graduating circles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Table Clocks", 1980s.
1980s. Graphite, red crayon on white paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-331.
